explains: adj. 即将到来的；接近的；新兴的

sentences.en: He strayed into the path of an oncoming car.
sentences.cn: 他偏到了一辆迎面驶来的汽车的行车路线上。

sentences.en: He threw himself into the path of an oncoming vehicle.
sentences.cn: 他冲入迎面有汽车驶来的路中。

sentences.en: She was thrown from his car after it skidded into the path of an oncoming car.
sentences.cn: 他的车滑到了逆向车道，与迎面驶来的车相撞后，她被从他的车里抛了出去。
